speaker: Host
content: Welcome to the show. Today we have a special guest.

speaker: Guest
content: Thanks for having me. Its great to be here.

speaker: Host
content: So tell us about your latest book.

speaker: Guest
content: Its about the history of space exploration from the 1950s to today.

speaker: Host
content: What inspired you to write it?

speaker: Guest
content: I grew up watching shuttle launches on TV. That sense of wonder never left.

speaker: Host
content: Fascinating. What surprised you most in your research?

speaker: Guest
content: How close we came to canceling the Apollo program before the moon landing.

speaker: Host
content: We will be right back after a short break.
